attributes.background: To fully stop 5G in the U.K. To stop testing of it immediately.

rejection.details:
You can read Government advice about 5G here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/5g-technologies-radio-waves-and-health/5g-technologies-radio-waves-and-health

You might like to sign this petition calling for an independent investigation into 5G safety, if that's something you'd like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312997
